article.Heading: GST: Pain for homebuyers
article.Summary: The goods and services tax (GST) has not been a boon for home-buyers in the country. At least, that's the sense coming in after the first 2 months of living with the new tax.
article.Body:
The goods and services tax (GST) has not been a boon for home-buyers in the country. At least, that's the sense coming in after the first 2 months of living with the new tax.

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18's Stacy Pereira for more details.
